channel.title: FPRunescape
channel.description: FPRunescape or First Person RuneScape is a project I'm working on that basicly makes RuneScape first person. I'll probably make a 3rd person option aswell. This game does not use ANY module of our current RuneScape and uses a complete different language than Java so this ain't RuneScape as we know it. It also gives me oppertunities to make RuneScape look better than ever with HD sound that's capable of loading wav's, mp3 and etc. In this game I get a polygon limit of +100K maybe more than 100, don't remember but that means some awesomeness. All I need atm is a map dump of 562 if possible for editing it in 3DS Max, I though you guys might be able to help me with this, as some of you know, I am capable of making decent games.

item.title: FPRunescape
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

SilentCJ:

Oh, plus, I used to have a client that dumps maps as you walk through the game, got it from Rune Server somewhere, if that’s of any use…

If you mean the one that was released by Edvinas, here’s the thread concerning it:
http://www.rune DASH server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/242975-how-capture-sprites-textures-geometry-shaders-runescape.html

item.title: FPRunescape
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

I wouldn’t start from complete scratch just yet.

I suggest starting with something, going along with it and see how it all unwraps. If all goes well, maybe you could rewrite the things you started off with, or perhaps start from scratch then.

Read full topic

</tile>

item.title: FPRunescape
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:33, topic:347402”]To be honest I suggest you give up, I can tell this is never gonna work, even if it did, the models are gonna look really low poly and shit, and a lot of the textures are only 64x64 so they’ll look shit, and I’m not even gonna go into combat and how you’re gonna do that, I mean, can you imagine them shitty hit sprites on an FPS?

Anyway, if you go into the Rune Server client section under tools, I think, then it should be there.
I would get you a direct link but my internet’s being shit atm and won’t even load the homepage.[/quote]Aight I’ll go for a check but even if it will be shit, it would be just cool walking trough varrock and such in REAL First Person not like those shit ass youtube vids.

EDIT: Found the tool, downloading it atm.

EDIT: If this turns out into something big, I could just remake the textures, maybe remodel some things and ofcourse use my own fx’s not the ones from jagex.

EDIT: That map editor is really useless to me, it’s everything BUT stable, I need something to convert those models to mqo ur editable dats.

Read full topic

item.title: FPRunescape
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

To be honest I suggest you give up, I can tell this is never gonna work, even if it did, the models are gonna look really low poly and shit, and a lot of the textures are only 64x64 so they’ll look shit, and I’m not even gonna go into combat and how you’re gonna do that, I mean, can you imagine them shitty hit sprites on an FPS?

Anyway, if you go into the Rune Server client section under tools, I think, then it should be there.
I would get you a direct link but my internet’s being shit atm and won’t even load the homepage.

Read full topic
